description:
Kaori lets loose with a bazooka, while Saeko is captured by an evil general, Jimetil.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Applicant Wants to Be a Traditional Japanese Woman?! Mokkori Can Overcome National Boundaries (Part 2)
Yamato Nadeshiko Shigan!? Mokkori wa Kokkyou o Koete (Kouhen)
大和撫子志願!? モッコリは国境を越えて (後編)
